sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个名词均有"亲戚，亲属"之意。
means: relative ： 普通用词，常可与relation换用，有时指一般的亲戚。
relation ： 一般指因血统或婚烟关系形成的亲戚。

word_mean: 关系，联系：一物体与另一物体产生联系时所处的环境或状态

sentence.Network_en: Watercolour still seems somehow to be the poor relation of oil painting.
sentence.Network_cn: 水彩画似乎仍比油画略逊一筹。

sentence.Network_en: He had a relation who lived up the road.
sentence.Network_cn: 他有个亲戚住在这条马路上。

sentence.Network_en: For many software packages, the price bears little relation to cost.
sentence.Network_cn: 对于很多软件包来说，价钱和成本没有什么联系。

jx.jx_en_mean: in the context of; in connection with

lj.lj_ly: there is an ambiguity in the provisions in relation to children's hearings.
lj.lj_ls: 关于儿童出席审讯的条款中有一意义不甚明确之处。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French, or from Latin relatio(n-), from referre 'bring back' (see relate)

entry.tran: (人、团体或国家之间的)联系，关系，往来
entry.def: Relations between people, groups, or countries are contacts between them and the way in which they behave towards each other.

example.ex: Greece has established full diplomatic relations with Israel...
example.tran: 希腊已经和以色列建立了全面的外交关系。

example.ex: Apparently relations between husband and wife had not improved...
example.tran: 很明显夫妇之间的关系没有改善。

entry.def: If you talk about the relation of one thing to another, you are talking about the ways in which they are connected.

example.ex: It is a question of the relation of ethics to economics.
example.tran: 这是一个伦理学和经济学的关系问题。

example.ex: ...a relation between youthful unemployment and drug-related offences...
example.tran: 年轻人失业与毒品相关犯罪之间的关联

entry.def: Your relations are the members of your family.

example.ex: In America they are touting Hugh Grant as the next Cary Grant (no relation).
example.tran: 在美国，他们把休·格兰特吹捧为第二个加里·格兰特(两人并无亲属关系)。

entry.def: You can talk about something in relation to something else when you want to compare the size, condition, or position of the two things.

example.ex: The money he'd been ordered to pay was minimal in relation to his salary.
example.tran: 他被要求支付的金额与他的薪水相比微不足道。

example.ex: ...women's position in relation to men in the context of the family...
example.tran: 在家庭范围内女人相对于男人的位置

entry.def: If something is said or done in relation to a subject, it is said or done in connection with that subject.

example.ex: ...a question which has been asked many times in relation to Irish affairs...
example.tran: 被问过多次的关于爱尔兰事务的问题

example.ex: He is the sixth person to be arrested in relation to the coup plot.
example.tran: 他是政变阴谋牵涉到的第6个被捕的人。

means.word_mean: 1. an abstraction belonging to or characteristic of two entities or parts together
2. the act of sexual procreation between a man and a woman; the man's penis is inserted into the woman's vagina and excited until orgasm and ejaculation occur
3. a person related by blood or marriage;

sentences.sentence: "police are searching for relatives of the deceased"
"he has distant relations back in New Jersey"
"he was the hero according to his own relation"
"his endless recounting of the incident eventually became unbearable"

means.word_mean: 5. (law) the principle that an act done at a later time is deemed by law to have occurred at an earlier time;

sentences.sentence: "his attorney argued for the relation back of the ammended complaint to the time the initial complaint was filed"

means.word_mean: 6. (usually plural) mutual dealings or connections among persons or groups;

auth_sentence.content: Darwin forwarded them to a relation, Francis Galton.
auth_sentence.res_content: Darwin forwarded them to a relation, Francis Galton.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Darwin forwarded them to a relation, Francis Galton.

auth_sentence.content: In relation the blog Did we show too much?
auth_sentence.res_content: In relation the blog Did we show too much?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In relation the blog Did we show too much?

auth_sentence.content: I do not see any relation with consciousness however.
auth_sentence.res_content: I do not see any relation with consciousness however.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I do not see any relation with consciousness however.

stems_affixes.word_buile: accommodate向…提供住处+ion动作或状态等→accommodation住处,膳宿
communicate交流;通讯+ion动作或状态等→communication传达,信息
congratulate祝贺,庆贺+ion动作或状态等→congratulation祝词,贺辞
consolidate巩固,加强+ion动作或状态等→consolidation巩固,合并
correlate使相互关联+ion动作或状态等→correlation相互关系,相关[性]
dictate口述,口授+ion动作或状态等→dictation
elevate举起,提拔+ion动作或状态等→elevation上升,提高
eliminate除去;淘汰;排[删,消]除+ion动作或状态等→elimination排除,除去,消除,消灭

stems_affixes.value_cn: 用公式表示,明确地表达,作简洁陈述
stems_affixes.word_buile: formulate用公式表示;系统地阐述+ion动作或状态等→formulation用公式表示,明确地表达,作简洁陈述
imitate模仿+ion动作或状态等→imitation模仿,效法
introduce引入,介绍+tion动作或状态等→introduction介绍
irrigate灌溉+ion动作或状态等→irrigation灌溉
reduce减少,缩小+tion动作或状态等→reduction减少

stems_affixes.value_cn: 关系,联系,叙述,故事,亲戚
stems_affixes.word_buile: relate叙述,讲,使联系,发生关系+ion动作或状态等→relation关系,联系,叙述
reproduce生殖;再现;繁殖+tion动作或状态等→n.繁殖,再现,复制品
requisite需要的+ion动作或状态等→requisition征用,要求

stems_affixes.value_cn: 翻译,译文,转化,调任,转换[物][数]平移
stems_affixes.word_buile: translate翻译,解释;转化+ion动作或状态等→translation翻译,译文,转化

Sentence.sentence: We're asking the customers to specify what they want," said Craig Prusher, the chain's vice president of government relations.

A recent article in The Harvard Crimson noted the shocking growth of Harvard's public relations arm in the last five years and it questioned whether a focus on risk management and avoiding controversy was really the best outward-looking face of this great institution.
They attach too much importance to public relations
Their lives in relation to Obama's presidency.

means.word_mean: 关系, 联系, 交往

sentences.en: There's no relation between the two things.
The relation of disease to poverty and ignorance is easy to see.
sentences.cn: 疾病与贫穷、无知之间的关系是显而易见的。

sentences.en: Race relations are an explosive issue.
sentences.cn: 种族关系是一个爆炸性的问题。

sentences.en: The two countries began to discuss their tense relations.
sentences.cn: 两国开始讨论他们之间的紧张关系。

means.word_mean: 亲戚(关系); 亲属(关系)

sentences.en: He is a distant relation of mine.
They invited all their relations to stay at Christmas.
sentences.cn: 他们邀请所有亲戚住下来共度圣诞节。

jushi.english: The report has relation to agriculture.
What he says bears no relation to what he does.
She paid a circular visit among her relation.
jushi.chinese: 她轮流逐一拜访她的亲友。
